short_summary: Purchase of bags of formate for YBX, YGR, YGV and Sept-Ile
description: Waterproof bags of 1000 kg of Sodium Formate
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**

**Title:**
Procurement of Bags of Formate for YBX, YGR, YGV, and Sept-Iles

**Reference Number:** WS3779269503 - Doc3782406914
**Solicitation Number:** WS3779269503

**Publication Date:** December 8, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 9, 2022, at 14:00 (EST)

**Procurement Details:**

This Request for Proposal is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) on behalf of Transport Canada. The purpose of this procurement is to acquire bags of 1000 kg of Sodium Formate located in Québec, Canada.

The procurement is open to all qualified vendors. Interested vendors must submit their bids electronically at the latest by 14:00 (EST) on December 9, 2022.

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity:**

* None specified

**Regions of Delivery:**

* Sept-Îles

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Sonia Langis (PWGSC)
* Email: sonia.langis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: Not available

**Notice URL:**

* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14847077?extsite=MTQ4NDcwNzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==


No attachments or additional documentation available. Please ensure that your responses are submitted according to the details outlined above. Failure to do so may result in non-responsive bid declaration. The deadline for submission is on December 9, 2022, at 14:00 (EST).

Note:
The original document was rewritten with an emphasis on clarity and conciseness. All relevant information was preserved while redundant sections were
